roleset.name: insert an extra something into an interstice
roleset.note: INTERCALATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: intercalate-v
example.text: the pontifices intercalated a day at the beginning of every fourth year ; whereas they should not have intercalated till the end of it
example.arg: at the beginning of every fourth year
whereas they should not have intercalated til the end of it

example.name: intercalation-n
example.text: This indicates a preference for intercalation between TAT triples over CG·C + /TA·T triples.
